Banner.Description: I have 3 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular, React, NodeJS and ExpressJS and sometimes in Python applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 3 years as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked writing unit tests, performing continuous integration, and covering backend developer roles with NodeJS, ExpressJS, NestJs, MongoDB and Mysql. I have led teams having empathy, exercising motivation to partners, and setting plans and goals together.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineer
Description: Developed and maintained a web-based application using Angular, Node.js, and MongoDB, resulting in improved user experience and increased performance.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs to support multiple applications, using Node.js and Express.
Built a real-time chat application using WebSockets and Node.js, increasing communication and collaboration among team members.
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.
Leading a team of 4 people in the development of a E-commerce platform made in React, Node, and MySQL.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Associate Software Engineer
Description: Experienced as a Fullstack Developer, focusing on React, Flutter, MongoDB, NodeJS and ExpressJS.
Successfully conducted testing, installation, configuration, and troubleshooting.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Intern Software Engineer
Description: Experienced as a Fullstack Developer, focusing on Angular, React, Laravel, PHP, and Docker.
Strengthened skills through training, workshops, and self-driven learning initiatives.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full-Stack Developer
Description: Proficiently developed and customized frontends using Angular and StoryBook, creating engaging user interfaces.
Demonstrated expertise in backend development with Node.js and ExpressJS, ensuring robust and efficient server-side functionalities.
Leveraged database technologies including MongoDB and Firebase to efficiently manage data and enhance application performance.
Developed and maintained web applications using Angular and React.
Implementation CI / CD in AWS. Refactoring and optimizing application load times.
Coding of API requests with RxJS.
Creation of modules with complex reactive forms
Improved website performance by optimizing images and implementing caching techniques.
Collaborated with designers and back-end developers to create responsive and user-friendly web experiences

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Content Upload Web
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Patient testimonial and workflow management software developed for Hospital Chain in the USA and Europe. Client wants to capture user-generated content (patient testimonials, medical content) in video, audio, and picture text formats.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: CovidIT
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A MEAN stack web application and IOT device, using web technologies, robotic and image processing technologies to protect frontline health workers from COVID-19.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Urban Planning System (India's First Satellite Development Hackathon)
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A web and mobile application for predict and view quality of the area using Geographical Information System and RAW satellite data.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: The Cakesmith
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A web-based E-Commerce application for placing the orders and interacting with the client and staff and manage the processes.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: WEB POS system - Backend
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Backend of the web point of sales sytem for local client.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
